moves.name: Absorb
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Growth
moves.description: The user's body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

moves.name: Poison Sting
moves.description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: Stun Spore
moves.description: The user scatters a cloud of paralyzing powder. It may leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Mega Drain
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Leech Seed
moves.description: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.

moves.name: Magical Leaf
moves.description: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack will not miss.

moves.name: Grass Whistle
moves.description: The user plays a pleasant melody that lulls the target into a deep sleep.

moves.name: Giga Drain
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Toxic Spikes
moves.description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the opponent's feet. They poison opponents that switch into battle.

moves.name: Sweet Scent
moves.description: A sweet scent that lowers the opposing team's evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokémon if used in grass, etc.

moves.name: Ingrain
moves.description: The user lays roots that restore its HP on every turn. Because it is rooted, it can't switch out.

moves.name: Petal Dance
moves.description: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

moves.name: Aromatherapy
moves.description: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status problems affecting the user's party.

moves.name: Synthesis
moves.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

moves.name: Petal Blizzard
moves.description: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks everything around it.
